attributes.action: Give Jordan Pickford a Knighthood and a Victoria Cross for that save!
attributes.background: Jordan Pickford is a hero! And needs recognition. His efforts on that rollercoasterof a last 16 game have no doubt led to the conception of many more future british taxpayers and he deserves recognition.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
